query:
-- 1.4.1 Create invoice_views table
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `invoiceViews` (
  `id` INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `invoiceId` INT NOT NULL,
  `viewedAt` TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `ipAddress` VARCHAR(45) NULL,
  `userAgent` TEXT NULL,
  `isFirstView` BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT FALSE,
  `createdAt` TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

-- Add index for faster lookups by invoiceId
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `idx_invoice_views_invoice_id` ON `invoiceViews` (`invoiceId`);

  `ipAddress` VARCHAR(45) NULL,

-- Add index for faster lookups by invoiceId
